alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 27 at 12:30PM PDT until March 27 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45. For the second Wind Advisory, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Esmeralda and Central Nye County. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 8 PM PDT this evening. For the second Wind Advisory, from 10 AM to 7 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Strong crosswinds will make driving difficult for high profile vehicles and motorcycles. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are likely just before the arrival or in the absence of rain showers Monday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
